summary: Simple mod that allows you to craft Ahzidal's Ring of Arcana that looks like the Ring of Hircine.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff0000][size=5][/size][/color][/center][center][color=#ff0000][size=5]
[/size][/color][color=#980000][size=5]Welcome!

[/size][/color][color=#000000]Here's a simple mod that makes Ahzidal's Ring of Arcana craft-able.[/color]

[color=#000000]I don't know about you, but i really like the ring, i think it's the best in the game[/color]
[color=#000000](If you have the right perks).[/color]

[color=#000000]If you want it at the start of the game, Now you can :O .
Fun for starting a new mage play-through.[/color]

[color=#980000]Requires the Dragonborn DLC.

[/color][color=#000000]It's a esp file, so just drop it to your data folder or use Mod Organizer.

[/color][color=#980000]Enjoy![/color]

[/center]
author: SvAp0r
